name: mlNikon's Unicorn Milk
description:
This is a fruity pastel mix that tastes like the pic for this weeks mixin vixen profile imo which is yet another unicorn. Pretty tasty with a nice bright element.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ghcMTEQ65mY&feature=youtu.be

If you like what we do and want to support us in a fun tasty way, check out our one shot line! https://flavorjungle.com/pages/search-results-page?q=mixing+vixens
author: mixinvixens

reviews.text: Been meaning to try this for some time, ordered the vt raspberry jam specifically for this recipe. I finally just got around to mixing a 30ml of this and will return in 3 to 5 days with an update and to add stars for review, definitely mixed in confidence as Emily has never failed me before!
